recipe.name: Chipotle Burgers
recipe.notes: Brandon likes this recipe with four times as many chipotles as the recipe recommends. ;-)
recipe.instructions: Preheat grill burners on high, covered, 10 minutes Open any whole chipotles and discard seeds, then mince chipotles. Mix chipotles (with sauce), beef, onion, and salt with your hands, then form mixture into 4 (3/4-inch-thick) patties. Grill burgers on lightly oiled grill rack, covered if using gas grill, turning over once, 4 minutes total for medium-rare. Grill hamburger buns, cut sides down, until grill marks appear, about 30 seconds. Serve burgers in hamburger buns.
